<h3 id="X38158">X(38158) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(9), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*(b+c)*a^5-(9*b^2+2*b*c+9*c^2)*a^4+2*(b+c)*(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^3+6*(b^2-c^2)^2*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(9*b^2+14*b*c+9*c^2)*a+3*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38158) = 4*X(5)-X(5542) = 3*X(5)-X(38041) = X(7)-7*X(7989) = X(9)+2*X(19925) = 2*X(355)+X(30331) = X(390)+5*X(37714) = 3*X(5542)-4*X(38041) = 3*X(5587)-X(38149) = X(5759)+5*X(18492) = 3*X(5817)+X(38149) = 5*X(5818)+X(11372) = 2*X(38031)-3*X(38059) = X(38031)-3*X(38108) = X(38037)-3*X(38075) = 3*X(38075)+X(38154) = 3*X(38101)-2*X(38130) = 3*X(38101)-4*X(38179) = 3*X(38139)+X(38175) = 4*X(38139)+X(38210) = 4*X(38175)-3*X(38210)</b>
<p>
This triangle has collinear vertices.</p>
<p>X(38158) lies on these lines: {4,9}, {5,5542}, {7,7989}, {12,10392}, {30,38101}, {355,30331}, {390,7319}, {515,16857}, {517,38139}, {518,3817}, {519,38037}, {527,38076}, {758,38160}, {971,10175}, {1210,15841}, {1503,38194}, {1698,36991}, {1699,5686}, {2801,38054}, {2802,38159}, {2829,38216}, {2951,9780}, {3091,5223}, {3545,38036}, {3634,5732}, {3947,5728}, {4297,6666}, {4301,24393}, {4847,9779}, {5055,38030}, {5226,7988}, {5261,30330}, {5572,9947}, {5691,18230}, {5731,17554}, {5762,38140}, {5777,30329}, {5779,30424}, {5809,13405}, {5842,38217}, {5847,38145}, {5850,38150}, {5853,38155}, {5856,38161}, {5857,38162}, {5886,21625}, {6245,10172}, {6684,31672}, {6738,8232}, {8226,21060}, {8236,37712}, {10171,38053}, {10398,10590}, {12635,24389}, {14872,20116}, {21153,28164}, {28160,38113}, {28194,38126}, {28204,38043}, {28208,38082}, {31658,31673}</p>
<p>
X(38158) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1699, 5686}, {5587, 5817}, {8236, 37712}, {38037, 38154}<br>
X(38158) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (38053, 10171), (38059, 38108), (38122, 10172), (38130, 38179), (38204, 10175)<br>
X(38158) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38075, 38154, 38037), (38130, 38179, 38101)<br>
</p>
